column4: whats the easiest way to redirect your sound output to your mic input?
Easiest way is with a double male mini phone cable, if I understand correctly what you're trying to accomplish.
Jordan_U, i am actually trying to play some music in the input, so it gets caught by skype
Then the easiest way is with a double male mini phone cable. You can also use pulseaudio to achieve the same thing in software.
